attributes.action: Insure that MPs behave in accordance to what is expected of a gentleman/lady
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All of us who have been fortunate enough to watch a session of the House of Commons noticed that MPs tend to misbehave and to get too noisy. Would the Prime Minister consider passing legislation to create stricter sentences for those Members of Parliament who do not behave in a civilised and orderly manner?
